<LINK rel="shortcut icon" href="_SupportFiles/favicon.ico" />
<META http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
<META name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
<style type="text/css">
	Body{
		background: @Session.Body-bg~;
	}
	
	#navigation{
		background: @Session.Header-bg~;
	}
	
	#Sidebar{
		background: @Session.Sidebar-bg~;
	}
	
	#FooterWrap #Footer{
		background: @Session.Footer-bg~;
	}
</style>

<![endif]-->
